skillTree.name: Phantom
skillTree.description: As a shadow of vengeance rides the Sword of Solkan through the dark streets of Marienburg, some say his horse Phantom is the vengeful image of Solkan himself.

skillTree.name: Solkan's Blessing
skillTree.description: He who is blessed by the God of Law fears only his wrathful gaze

skillTree.name: Solkan's Agents
skillTree.description: Acting from the shadows, the agents of Solkan are the eyes and ears of the cult. Secretly operating throughout the entire Empire in their crusade against evil.

skillTree.name: Black Cap Contracts
skillTree.description: The Sword of Solkan relies on intelligence provided by the Black Caps, as the night's watch secretly shares their assumptions when they suspect the worship of Chaos.

skillTree.name: The Ties that Bound
skillTree.description: Not one living soul knows the true identity of the Sword of Solkan, but many speculate he must be a member of one of the most influential families. Perhaps even the most influential one. As he permits himself access to places unaccessable to others.

effects.description: Ability: "Guardian" while embedded in Van de Kuyper's army

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Cloaked Spirit of Solkan
skillTree.description: As Solkan's agent calls out the heretic, he inflicts the retribution of the Gods of Law on those who offend them. The eyesless gaze of Solkan fixed on the transgressor.

skillTree.name: Golden Fist of Purity
skillTree.description: One of Solkan's symbols is the golden fist. Displaying both Solkan's wrathful and pure nature.

skillTree.name: Liber Flamma Purgatio
skillTree.description: The Liber Flamma Purgatio is a vital relic among the Cult of Solkan's acolytes. It is said to hold secrets instrumental in the fight against chaos, and many of chaos cultist has attempted to snatch it from the cult's watchful gaze.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Anonymous Beneficiaries
skillTree.description: Anonymous yet extremely wealthy sponsors enable the Sword to perform his actions. His sponsors count themselves true Marienburger aristocrats. Rooting for his cause.

skillTree.name: The Amulet Shattered
skillTree.description: The Order of the Shattered Amulet is a minor order part of the cult of Solkan, they are devote to restoring the most profound artifact of Solkan's lore, his amulet. Their quest has lead them to the Wasteland for reasons unknown.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +15 or Knights of the Cleansing Flame (Empire Knights)
	(Hero's army)
Capacity: +2 for Knights of the Cleansing Flame (Empire Knights)

skillTree.name: Foil of Imminent Justice
skillTree.description: Not only extremely skilled with his greatsword, the Sword of Solkan fights with a certain uncanning determination, giving him the edge against many of foe.

skillTree.name: Scales of Righteousness
skillTree.description: None can outrun Solkan's judgement, as in time all shall fall under his merciless gaze. Fleeing is only postponing the inevatible.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Spirit of Vengeance
backgroundSkills.description: Of the Cult of Solkan is the Sword that battles Chaos, The Sword of Solkan is it's sharpest tip.

effects.description: Ward save: 10% when fighting against Norsca, Warriors of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Daemons of Chaos

items.name: Solkan's Greatsword
items.description: Said to be blessed by Solkan the Avenger himself, the one worthy to wield this greatswords carries a great power, with a great responsiblity.

effects.description: Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for Black Caps (Goedendagers)

items.name: Captain Theophilus Graveland
items.description: Theophilus Graveland came to Marienburg from Kalkaat, a town in Kleinland. He started his career as a bounty hunter, tracking smugglers and pirates who preyed on river traffic. Not because he cared, but because tracking and hunting other people was the only thing he was good at. Almost all his travels led to Marienburg, and to Suiddock. In the time he spent hunting criminals there, he came to know its people and found among them and their vitality something he lacked - something to care about and protect for its own sake, not just for the reward money. And so he became a member of the Black Caps, taking promotions only when they allowed him to stay in Suiddock. He was finally promoted to Watch Captain a few years ago, and has been tireless in guarding the docklands and its people.

ui_effects.description: Creates an illusion of the Sword of Solkan

items.name: Ring of Solkan
items.description: The Sword of Solkan's magical ring allows him to adapt many forms, further augmenting his natural disguise abilities.
